#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<iomanip>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define init0(array) memset(array,LONG_MIN,sizeof(array))
#define initm1(array) memset(array,-1,sizeof(array))
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef double db;



int main()
{ 
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin.tie(NULL);
   ll t,a[1005],n;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
   	ll maxx,minn;		
   	cin>>n;
   	for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>a[i];
	minn=a[0];
    ll diff=LONG_MIN;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
    	if(a[i]-minn>diff) diff=a[i]-minn;
    	if(a[i]<minn) minn=a[i];
	}
	cout<<diff<<"\n";
   }
  return 0;
}
